div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiijo die mensis
Decembris anno quo supra

The said day the baillies counsaile and communite warnit be the premunicioun'
of the hand' bell throw the haile tovnn' gatherit representand' the body
of the tovnn' and circualie inquerit be Williame scimgeour ane of the
officiaris of the said burgh' ale in ane voice concordande gef grantit and'
assignit to thar traist clerk and nychtbour sone maister Dauid menyheis
ale and' haile thar chapellanry of Sanct Duthois alter with ale proffitis
Richtis and pertinence pertenyng or may pertene tharto Situat' withtin
the paris' kirk of the said burgh' for ale the dais of his lyve vacand'
be deces' of vmquhile ser Willeame crukschank last possessour of the
samyn and' constituit maid and ordanit Johnne' lesly of Warderis aldirman
ser Johnne ruthirfurd knycht Alexander meyeis Robert binseile Dauy
menyheis Alexander reid' Alexander chamer Johnne of Cullane
gilbert menyeis and James collisoun' thar commissaris coniunctly' and seueraly
tile Institut and Inuest the said master Dauid in the said chapellanry
and / ordanit Euidencis vnder thar commone Seill according tharto
to be maid in dew forme to the said master Dauid / one the Souerast
wise be thar commone' clerk

The said day Alexander blair lauchfully callit and nocht comperit
tile entir Alexander Iruyne as he that come souerty for him to entir
him the said day tharto heir the deposicionis oppynnit betuix him
and Johnne meldrum anent the clame of ane cors' boll de
batable' betuix the said partiis And thareftir the balyeis
chargit Williame scrimgeour officiar to pas and tak ane
strass' of the saide Alexander blair And lat It to borgh'
gif it be askit as secund And' warne the said' Alexander
to compeir the law day day eftir yuyll tharto entir heir the
said deposicionis oppinnit as secund day of process'

The said day Dauy syme was in ane amerciament of the court be
his avin toung graunt for the dissobeying of the Officiaris
passand furtht of the tolbuth' he beande conuict' for stribulance
of Donald baxtar et cetera And nocht fulfillande the deliuerance of the
assis' past tharupone And' thareftir in dissobeyng of Or
mund' leslie Officiar quhene he comprehendit him within the
said' burgh' and chargit him to entir his persone within the
said' tolbuth' quhile he fulfillit the deliuerance of the said'
assis' quhilkis he dide nocht' Tharfor he consentit and'
euire he s dissobey ony officiar of the said' burgh' in tyme
to cum and' beis conuict tharof sale neuyr remane within
the said burgh'

The said day it was sufficientlie preuit that philpe of Kelly one that
ane part and' Johne masoun' pynor one that vthir part was bun
din and oblist be the faithtis of thar bodies to stand' and' abid' at
the deliuerance of Dauid blinseill cristofer prat Williame scherar
litstar and' Sande prat and Robert murray arbitouris and' amicabile com
ponitouris chosin betuis the said' partis anent the skaith' done tile
ane hors' pertenyng to the said' Johnn' quhilkis arbitouris fand'
and' deliuerit that that the said' philp Kelly had' skatht the said'
hors' ane french' crovne quhilk crovne he deliuerit to the said' John
Incontinent thareftir the deliuerance forsaide

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem Nono die mensis
Januarij Anno quo supra

The said day Johnne of cullan fand ane borgh' in the handis of William
scrimgeour ane of the Officiaris of this burgh that Johnne gordone
of pettare wranguisly and aganis the law withthauldis fra him
the Some of fourty pundis be gud estimacioun' to compt and Raknyn
for costis and expensis maid' one him and' his men in his hous' in met and
drink at thar cumin diuers' tymes be the space of thre yeris et cetera
quhilk borgh' the sad' Johnne denyit and Incontinent with consent of
baitht the said' partiis was put to the decesioun' of ane suorn' assis'
quhilkis Riplie avisit the Rychtis resonis and witnes of baitht' the said'
producit and vndirstandin deliuerit and fand' be gilbert menyeis for
spekar of the sad' assis' that the sad' borgh' was fundin of
Nane awaile for oucht that thai hes' sein or herd as yeit
for the quhilkis the said' Johnne was in ane amerciament of
the court et cetera

Curia capitalis balliuorum de Aberdene tenta in pretorio burgi eiusdem
decimotercio die mensis Januarij Anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo quarto
Quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent /

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Johannes malisone capellanus et pro
testatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu octo solidorum de quadam terra penitus
vasta iacente infra dictum burgum in vico furcarum ex orientali parte eiusdem vicj inter
terram rectoris de oyne ex australi ex vna et terram heredum quondam Robertj
Cullane ex boreali partibus ab altera et communiones vias regias versus oriens et
occidens Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus
testibus thoma buchane Roberto piper et ormundo lesly sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Johannes Arnot minister domus
Sancte trinitatis de abirdene protestans in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu xl
denariorum vsualis monete scocie sibi et dicti domuj ac conuentui eiusdem annuatim debito
que quadam terra penitus vasta Jacente infra dictum burgum in futy inter terram
quondam alexander Westland ex australi ex vna et terram quondam Willelmi menyeis ex borealj
et communionem viam regiam ex occidentali extendens in longitudine ad maris
fluxum sine arenas versus oriens Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam
primo die huius processus Testibus Johanne hay allutario andrea kirkland'
et Andrea nachtj sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Johannes Arnot minister domus
sancte trinitatis de abirdene et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo
redditu quinque s' sibi et dicto loco annuatim debito et a longo tempore non soluto
de quadam terra vasta Jacente in occidentali parte vicj Nauium ex borealj
parte eiusdem inter terram quondam dominum thome hervy ex orientali ex vna
et communionem viam regiam ex occidentali partibus ab altera Ad
quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram
et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam primo
die huius processus Testibus Willelmo colp alexandro prat et
Andrea nachtj sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Andreas chamer capellanus
altaris sancti cristiforj infra ecclesiam parrochialem sanctj nicholaij de abirdene
situati Et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu quinque solidorum
sibi et dicto altarj annuatim debito et non soluto de quadam terra vasta iacente
in ex in occidentali parte vicj Nauium ex boreali parte eiusdem inter terram quondam
Domini thome henry ex orientali ex vna et communionem viam regiam ex occidentalj
partibus ab altera Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter
terram et lapides quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam primo
die huius processus

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Dauid Walcar capellanus
fundatus ad altare sanctj leonardj per quondam Dauid Symsone et protestatus fuit
in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu xiij s' et octo d' vsualis monete Scocie
sibi annuatim debito et a longo tempore non solut de quadam terra vasta quondam
thome cullan iacente in le gastraw inter terram heredum quondam Duncanj
clat ex boreali ex vna et terram quondam Robertj ex australi et communionem
viam regiam versus oriens Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam primo
die huius processus Testibus alexander moresone alexandro Donaldson' et
gilberto prestone sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Dauid Walcar capellanus
fundatus ad altare sanctj leonardj per quondam Dauid Symsone protestans solempniter
in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu trium solidorum de quadam terra Jacobi
Kennertj penitus vasta infra dictum burgum in vico viridj inter terram Donaldj
sclater ex borealj et terram capelle sancte Katherine virginis ex australi
et communionem venellam ex occidentali Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit
in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Alexandro moreson' Alexander
Donaldsone et gilberto prestone sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Johannes Reid capellanus
ac procurator altaris sanctj Jacobi apostoli infra ecclesiam sanctj Nicholaj
de Abirdene situati et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu
quadraginta denariorum sibi et dicto altarj annuatim debito et a longo
tempore non soluto de quadam terra vasta quondam henricj Rany Jacente in futy
inter terram quondam Willelmum Rany ex australi ex vna et terram quondam
Willelmum Westland' ex boreali partibus ab altera Ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in
Sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus

Eodem die tribus processibus perlectis per dominum andream collisone capellanum
perpetuum altaris Sancti Stephani prothomarteris infra ecclesiam perrochialem sancti
nicholaij de abirdene situati de et super recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis
cuiusdam terre vaste quondam henricj Rany Jacente in futy inter terram quondam Willelmi
Rany ex australi ex vna et terram quondam Willelmum Westland ex boreali partibus
ab altera in defectu solucionis vnius annuj redditus sex solidorum et octo denariorum
vsualis monete scocie sibi et dicto altarj annuatim debito et a longo tempore non soluto
vnde dictus dominus andreas pecijt a nobis secundum cuj formam et effectum suj processus
precedens Juris et Justicie complementum sibi fierj de dicta terra cum pertinencijs
Et consequenter dominus dauid leill prelocutore dicti domini andree porrexit plegium
in manibus Willelmum scromgeour sergeandj quod ipse dominus andreas porrexit plegium
possessionem recuperauit de dicta terra cum pertinenciis in defectu solucionis annuj
redditus prelibatj Vnde hora diej legittime expectata omnibus Interesse vocato
et nullo comparenti de Jure opponenti decretum fuit ex ore alexandrj Joffrasoun'
Judicatoris curie et datum pro iudicio quod ipse causam suam obtenit in recuperacione
proprietatis dicte terre cum pertinenciis Similiter quibus dictus dominus Dauid pecijt
nomine prelocutorio quosupra pecijt Justis Testibus Jacobo collisone Johanne
Ratre andrea cullan Dauid theman Dauid blinseill magistro alexandro fif thoma
chamer Roberto Waus Dauid straloch' et Johanne meldrum

Eodem die tribus processibus perlectis per Religiosum virum fratrem andream storour
priorem carmelitarum dictj burgj nomine conuentui eiusdem de et super
recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis cuiusdam terre vaste thome pyot pertinenciis
Jacente in vico viridj ex australi parte eiusdem inter terram Jacobi pyot ex occidentali
et vna et terram dictum fratrum sine domus ex australi partibus ab altera et communiones
vias regias versus oriens et boream in defectu solucionis vnius annuj redditus
decim solidorum vsualis monete scocie sibi et dictus domus annuatim debito et a
longo tempore non soluto vnde dictus prior pecijt a nobis secundum vnij formam
et effectum suj processus precedens Juris et Justicie complementum sibi fierj
de dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et consequenter dominus Dauid liell prelocutor
dictj prioris domini andree porrexit plegium in manibus Willelmum scrimgeour vnius
sergeandorum dictj burgj quod ipse prior proprietatem et possessionem recuperauit
de dicta terra cum pertinentcijs in defectu solucionis annuj redditus antedictj
Vnde hora diej legittime expectata omnibus Interesse habenti vocato et nullo comparenti nec
de Jure opponenti Decretum fuit ex ore Alexandri Joffrasoun' Judicatoris curie
et datum pro iudicio quod ipse causam suam obtenuit in recuperacione proprietatis
Dicte terre cum pertinencijs Sibi quibus dictus dominus Dauid nomine prelo
cutorio quo supra pecijt Instrumentum Testibus Johanne Ruthirfurd' militem
Alexandro Reid Jacobo collisone Johanne Ratre Andrea cullan Dauid theman
ut supra

The said day the aldirman and' bailyes assignit this day xv dais to sere John
rutherfurd' to ansuer to marione scherar' for the wranguis' withhalding fra
hir of ane land pertenynge to hir in coniunctfeftment eftir the tenor of hir bile of
complant gevin tharupoun et cetera

The said day the bailyeis assignit friday that nixt cumis tile patry
chirnsid' to ansuer peremptourly to the borgh fundin one him be Alexander
prat for the wranguisly halding fra him of xli li' of hemp and demi

The said day gilbert menyeis lauchdully callit and nocht comperit to ansueir at
the instance of thomas chamer Anent the gudis of airschip pertenyng to him be
the deces' of vmquhile Williame chamer as caucionar for Alexander chamer
tharfor the bailyeis ordanit gilbert prestoun' Officiar to pas and tak ane strace
of the said' gilbert and lat it agane to borgh' and' It be askit And warne him
to compeir this day xv dais to ansuer for the said' archipe as thrid day of
process' And the bailyeis chargit the said Officiar to warne Alexander
chamer to the said day to releiwe the said gilbert of the said arschipe et cetera

The saide day Johne Andirsone falyeyt in his preiwe that was assignit him to preiwe
that he pait Ane barrele of Salmond' to Alexander prat Anent Robertsaone and that the
court wardit schew for law and It was gevin for dome

The said day the borgh fundin be Johnne arthour one gilbert litstar for the
wranguis' halding fra him of xxvj li' witht the mair for tua pipis
of wad was fundin of Nane awale for the quhilkis the said Johnne
was in ane amerciament of the court And' the said' gilbert quiet of his
challance

The said day the bailyeis assignit this day xv dais to gilbert litstar to
ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be Johnne Arthour for the wranguis'
awaytakin of ane pipe of wad' fra the key pertenyng to the said'
Johnne

The said' day thome tailyour in futy warnit lauchfully callit ande
nocht comperit to ansuer to the borgh fundin one him be huchone Wellis
that he aucht to releiw him of ane berrell of salmond at the haundis
of george bisset tharfor the bailyeis ordanit gilbert prestoun' to tak an
stras' of the said' thomas and lat it agane to borgh' gif it be askit and
warne him to compeir this day xv dais to ansueir to the said' borgh'
as secund day of process'

The saide day the aldirman and counsale grantit thame avande in
the townez nayme to Dauy theman foure markis vsuale money
of Scotlande for the kepin of thar common horelege and knok and
for ane vnce and demi vnce of Siluer quhilk he put in the common
armes of the tovne gevin to thar commone menstralis quhene
thai passit to our' Souerane lordis marage at the tovnes command'
quhilkis thai gravntit to pay to the saide Dauy

The said day the counsaile and communite maid' constituit and ordanit Johnne lesly
alderman Alexander enyeis Robert blinseill Dauid menyeis Alexander red'
Johnne cullan gilbert menyeis John Ratre thomas leslie Johnne mar thomas Jacobum collison
Waus Dauid steuart and patry leslie coniunctly and seueralie thair'
procuratores to defend' the Summonce maid one thame one the behalf
of sere Johne ruthirfurd' knicht Anent the patronage of Sanct micha
elis altir with power to substitut ane or may And' ordanit ane procura
to be maid' vnder thar commoun' seill In dew forme

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus andreas collisone capel
lanus perpetuus altais sanctj michaelis stephanj prothomartiris infra ecclesiam parrochialem
Sanctj nicholaij de abirdene situati et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro
vno annuo Redditu octo solidorum vsualis monete scocie sibi et dicto altarj
annuatim debito et a longo tempore non soluto de quadam terra vasta quondam
Willelmum nory iacente in vico superiore ecclesie inter terram ipsius Willelmum ex
occidentalj ex vna et torrentem distenden' ad molendinum superius versus
oriens et communionem viam regiam versus boream Ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in
Sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Willelmo
belty alexandro lamyntone and Willelmo scrimgeour sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad baram discretus vir magister alexander fyf
cpellanus perpetuus altaris sanctj marie virginis infra ecclesiam
parrochialem sanctj nicholaij de Abirdene situati et protestatus fuit in forma
Juris pro vno annuo Redditu quinque solidorum monete scocie sibi et dicto altarj
annuatim debito et a longo tempore non soluto de quadam terra vasta quondam
Willelmum Nory iacente infra dictum burgum in vico superiori ecclesie ex australi
parte eiusdem vicj inter terram ipsius quondam Willelmum ex occidentali ex vna
et torrentem ad molendinum supernis discendum ex orientali partibus
ab altera Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter
terram et lapides quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in Curia
tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Willelmo belty alexandro
lamyntone et Willelmo scrimgrour sergeando

head.add: Absentes de curia precedens de burgensis extra manentibus

div.p:
Moricius fergus
andreas brabner
Dauid lambe
thomas Dauysone
henricus leithe
Robertus Dauyson'
georgius fentone
longus Walterus in monycabok
Alexander panton'
andreas Dvne
Dauid hay
matheus reid'
Robertus hendirsone
Andreas Watsone in cullan
georgius gordone
Johannes lochhillis
Johannes Wilkesone in cromar'
Thomas Wodman
Johannes ma' dys'
Andreas baxter
Thomas baxter in nevburgh'
Thomas moir in tochone
Symon michell
Johannes heroun'
Johannes brabnar
andreas portar in Davyot

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xvijo
die mensis Januarij anno quo supra

The saide day the ballieis assignit monunday that next cumis to
Johne Auchneiwe tile ansuer' peremptourlie to the borghe' fundin
one him be Johne horne for the wranguis' haldin fra him of
his bil emissiue and the avale of his gudis contenit in the samyn that is
sex scoir' lenterinwair' vijxx futuale and xl corbis and vj eln' of bog
tanny

The saide day Dauy mar' yongar was chargit be the balyeis and officiaris
to reman within the tolbutht quhile he deliuerit to William blinsele his
chartir and evidencis eftir the tenor of the actis maide tharupon' obefor

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xx die
mensis februarij Januarij anno quo supra

The saide day Richerde redhede follouit Johne flessour be ane borghe'
for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of ane quart Ande the saide Johne
grantit he hede ane quart deliuerit to him and askit ane day to
bring his warande and the ballieis assignit to him friday that next
Cumi to bring his warande becaus' he gravntit his warande within
this burghe

The saide day Johne auchneiwe grantit to ger' Ansuer Johne
horne in the erast Schip passande in flaundris for vjxx lenterinvayr'
vijxx of futuale and corbis and sex eln' of bogtanny clatht Ande
gif the saide gudis be sellit he sale ger' ansuer him of the money that is tane
for thame and atour the saide Johne auchneiwe sal beir' the aventour of
the saide gudis and lene him xxtj s' within viij dais hereftir quhile the
said' gudis cum hame and to be allouit in the Samyn to the saide
Johne auchneyve be the saide Jhon' horne
